thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Johnson & Johnson Results Driven by Pharmaceutical Sales Growth

author: Jonathan D. Rockoff
title: Johnson & Johnson Results Driven by Pharmaceutical Sales Growth
text:
Johnson & Johnson sales rose in the fourth quarter, but the company reported a loss after taking a $13.6 billion charge as a result of the new U.S. tax law.
J&J expects the new law to lower its effective tax rate by 1.5 to 2.5 percentage points from the current rate of 17.2%.
Analysts said the positive impact probably figured in...
